events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund for this purchase.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to customer's mention of requesting money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request and follow up on the issue.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and explain why you would like to return the product?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The product was different from what was shown on the website and does not meet my expectations.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund once the returned item is received. I will send you the instructions for the return shipping shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the item back today.
We have received your returned product and your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund process is completed and no further inquiries were received, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Please let us know how we did with handling your refund request.
